DOC.brief_summary: This study compare three technique uterine closure myometrium thickness evaluate ultrasound six month primary cesarean . The three technique include : 1 ) lock single layer closure ; 2 ) double layer closure first continuous locked suture second imbricate continuous suture ; 3 ) double layer closure first continuous unlocked suture deep portion myometrium avoid inclusion decidua second unlocked continuous suture approximate upper portion myometrium . The primary outcome mean myometrium thickness site uterine scar evaluate transvaginal ultrasound six month cesarean .
